title: Wiki Manager Service (wikimgr)
content:
# Wiki Manager Service (wikimgr)

Automates creation and updates of Wiki.js pages through a small FastAPI service with request validation, idempotency keys, path normalization, and retries.

## Why
- Keep documentation up-to-date from other systems (bots, scripts, CI).
- Avoid manual copy/paste into Wiki.js for routine updates.
- Provide a stable webhook-like endpoint that enforces consistency (paths, tags, etc.).

## Endpoints
- `GET /healthz`
- `GET /readyz`
- `POST /pages/upsert`
